About the course:

Welcome to this In-Depth and Comprehensive Change Management Course!


In today’s fast-paced and ever-changing business environment, organizations must adapt to continuous transformations to stay competitive and relevant. Effective change management has become an essential skill for leaders, managers, and professionals across all sectors. This "Organization Change Management" course is tailored to provide you with the knowledge, strategies, and tools required to understand, plan, and implement successful organizational changes.


Discover the key to successful change delivery with this Organization Change Management course, carefully designed based on years of practical experience managing projects for industry leaders such as Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and more.


This Organization Change Management course is built on my extensive experience working with major global corporations, including Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and many others.


This Organization Change Management course delves into two major standards and methodologies: the Association of Change Management Professionals (ACMP) and ADKAR (developed by Prosci). This combination will provide you with the tools and knowledge needed to manage highly complex and large-scale change projects or initiatives with significant change components. If you aim to pursue certification in Change Management, this course will prepare you to pass the exams for both ACMP and PROSCI, enabling you to become a certified change management professional.


This Organization Change Management course is particularly beneficial for Project Managers, especially those holding PMI PMP certification. It will deepen your understanding of Change Management and its connection to Project Management, equipping you to excel in managing projects with substantial change elements. Additionally, it offers 12 PMI PDUs to support your certification maintenance.


This Organization Change Management course balances practical application with theoretical knowledge, following a logical progression of Change Management throughout the lifecycle of change project delivery.


A significant portion of this Organization Change Management course focuses on Analysis and Strategy for delivering change. Drawing from my experience, this aspect is typically executed in large, multinational corporations for complex change initiatives such as mergers, acquisitions, cultural transformations, or major reorganizations. These organizations often have a Global OCM (Organization Change Management Office) in place, as seen in companies like Oracle, SAP, Accenture, and Magna.


You will learn how to manage changes, assess the impact of change, and evaluate organizational readiness for change. From there, you will discover how to define a change strategy, create a Change Management Plan, and execute it effectively. You will gain a thorough understanding of these concepts and their application in major global corporations. As the course progresses, you will explore resistance management, sustainability of change, and the importance of engagement levels and types to ensure lasting and successful transformations. Mastering resistance management and sustainability is a critical differentiator between average and exceptional Change Managers.


Upon completing this Organization Change Management course, your perspective on changes and projects will shift toward a more strategic and forward-thinking approach. You will be able to see the bigger picture, anticipate future risks, and prevent issues that could jeopardize the success of change initiatives. Your insights and expertise will bring immediate value to your organization.


Additionally, you will learn how to raise awareness for change, foster desire for change, and secure support and commitment. You will also gain skills to build knowledge and ability within employees, ensuring their success post-change implementation.


This Organization Change Management course will distinguish you from average Change or Project Managers. By applying the tools and techniques learned here, you will become a highly valuable asset to your organization, enhancing your career advancement opportunities.


After completing the training and applying the knowledge to deliver several projects, you will likely advance to high-value strategic change initiatives or move into higher management roles, recognized as someone who consistently delivers value.


This Organization Change Management course is ideal for anyone responsible for driving change within organizations, including Change Managers, Project Managers, HR professionals, Team Leaders, Managers, and Senior Managers.


It is also perfect for those aspiring to become certified change management professionals through Prosci (ADKAR) or ACMP.


While some experience in managing change or projects is helpful, it is not mandatory, as all concepts are explained in detail. However, a basic understanding of project management theory is recommended.

Mastering Competency-Based Behavioral Interviews


Course Description:


Hiring the right talent is one of the most critical aspects of building a high-performing organization. Competency-based behavioral interviews help hiring managers, recruiters, and HR professionals assess candidates effectively by focusing on past experiences and demonstrated skills. This course is designed to equip you with the knowledge, techniques, and tools needed to conduct structured, competency-based interviews that lead to better hiring decisions.


Through practical case studies, real-world examples, and interview simulations, you’ll learn how to identify key competencies, structure behavioral interview questions, and evaluate candidate responses using a scoring system. Whether you are an HR professional, hiring manager, or recruiter, this course will enhance your interviewing skills and ensure you select the best-fit candidates for your organization.

What You’ll Learn:


The Fundamentals of Competency-Based Interviews – Understand the principles behind behavioral interviewing and how it improves hiring accuracy.


Developing a Competency Model – Learn how to define core competencies for different job roles and integrate them into the hiring process.


Crafting Effective Behavioral Interview Questions – Master the STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method and other structured interview techniques.


Evaluating Candidates Objectively – Implement competency-based scoring rubrics and minimize bias in the selection process.


Avoiding Common Interviewing Mistakes – Identify biases, pitfalls, and ineffective questioning methods that can lead to poor hiring decisions.


Improving Hiring Decisions with Data – Leverage competency frameworks, assessment grids, and interview scorecards for better decision-making.

Course Program:


1. Introduction to Competency-Based Interviews

courseDetails.title: COO: Domine a Excelência Operacional | 2025 [PT]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diretor de Operações | Gestão Operacional | Eficiência | Estratégia | Processos | KPI | OKR | Automação | Inovação
courseDetails.longDescription:
COO: Excelência Operacional e Qualificação em Gestão


Descrição do Curso:


No cenário competitivo atual, o papel do Chief Operating Officer (COO) é essencial para garantir eficiência operacional e alinhar as atividades diárias com os objetivos estratégicos da empresa. Este curso abrangente foi desenvolvido para qualificar COOs, diretores de operações e líderes empresariais com as habilidades e ferramentas necessárias para alcançar a excelência operacional. Com uma abordagem prática e estratégica, os participantes aprenderão a otimizar processos, impulsionar a cultura de alto desempenho e implementar estratégias que promovam crescimento sustentável.


O Que Você Vai Aprender:


Função do COO – Entenda as responsabilidades do COO e as competências essenciais para o sucesso na gestão operacional.


Planejamento e Execução Estratégica – Desenvolva e implemente estratégias empresariais eficazes utilizando ferramentas como SWOT e PESTEL.


Cultura Organizacional – Aprenda a estruturar e gerenciar uma cultura corporativa alinhada com os objetivos estratégicos da empresa.


Gestão de Desempenho – Defina e implemente KPIs e OKRs para acompanhar e melhorar a performance organizacional.


Otimização de Processos e Automação – Aprimore a eficiência operacional com análise, documentação e automação de processos.


Estrutura Organizacional – Desenvolva estruturas organizacionais que maximizam a alocação de recursos e impulsionam o crescimento.


Gestão de Projetos – Gerencie projetos desde a concepção até a execução, garantindo alinhamento estratégico.


Gestão Financeira para COOs – Aprenda a gerenciar orçamento, previsão financeira e fluxo de caixa para otimizar a performance empresarial.


Para Quem é Este Curso:


COOs e Diretores de Operações que desejam aprimorar suas competências em gestão operacional.


Gestores e Líderes Empresariais que buscam implementar práticas operacionais mais eficientes.


Profissionais de RH e Executivos que desejam expandir seu conhecimento para funções operacionais.


CEOs e Empreendedores interessados em melhorar a eficiência e lucratividade de suas empresas.


Estrutura do Curso:


O curso é composto por 10 módulos detalhados, liberados semanalmente, permitindo a absorção e aplicação prática do conteúdo. As aulas incluem materiais gravados, exercícios práticos e feedback personalizado para garantir a aplicação do conhecimento no dia a dia.


Principais Módulos:


1 O Papel do COO

• Responsabilidades e competências essenciais para um COO de sucesso.

• Ferramentas para avaliar e melhorar a eficiência operacional.


2 Desenvolvimento Estratégico

• Sessões de planejamento estratégico para a tomada de decisões eficazes.

• Aplicação de análises estratégicas para formulação de planos de ação.


3 Gestão da Cultura Organizacional

• Estruturando a cultura empresarial para alinhar com os objetivos estratégicos.

• Utilizando a cultura como diferencial competitivo.


4 Execução da Estratégia

• Estabelecimento e acompanhamento de KPIs e OKRs.

• Implementação de frameworks de execução disciplinada.


5 Otimização de Processos

• Mapeamento, análise e melhoria de processos operacionais.

• Integração de automação para maximizar eficiência.


6 Gestão da Estrutura Organizacional

• Desenvolvimento de estruturas organizacionais eficientes.

• Otimização de recursos humanos e responsabilidades.


7 Gestão de Projetos e Inovação

• Princípios essenciais de gestão de projetos.

• Como liderar mudanças organizacionais com eficácia.


8 Gestão Financeira para COOs

• Administração de fluxo de caixa, orçamento e planejamento financeiro.

• Implementação de controles financeiros estratégicos.


Por Que Escolher Este Curso?


Instrutor Especializado – Aprenda com Mike Pritula, profissional experiente em operações e liderança estratégica.

Abordagem Prática – Aplicação imediata dos conceitos através de exercícios e estudos de caso.

Flexibilidade – Formato 100% online, com aulas liberadas semanalmente para garantir um aprendizado contínuo.

Certificação – Ao concluir o curso, você receberá um certificado de qualificação em gestão operacional para comprovar sua expertise.


Inscreva-se Agora:


Destaque-se no mercado e leve sua organização à Excelência Operacional. Junte-se ao curso e adquira as habilidades essenciais para se tornar um COO de alto nível.

courseDetails.title: AI & Robots in Digital HR: Automate and Optimize Processes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Automation | Tech | People Analytics | HRIS | Future of Work | Agents | Chatbots | Machine Learning | Workforce ChatGPT
courseDetails.longDescription:
The “RoboHR: From ChatGPT to AIHR to Robots in HR Workflow” course at Mike Pritula Academy is designed to equip HR professionals with the knowledge and skills to integrate artificial intelligence and robotics into HR processes. As AI and robotics become increasingly prevalent in the workplace, this course prepares HR practitioners to optimize operations and embrace future advancements.


What You’ll Learn:

• Introduction to AI in HR: Understand the fundamentals of artificial intelligence and its current and future applications in HR.

• ChatGPT Capabilities in HR: Explore how ChatGPT can be utilized in recruiting, training, and employee support, including integration into HR systems and creating custom GPTs.

• Automating and Improving Processes with ChatGPT: Learn to automate routine queries, provide employee support, create personalized training programs, and enhance corporate culture and employer branding using ChatGPT.

• AI in Recruiting and Staffing: Discover tools to improve job descriptions, automate CV screening, assess candidate fit, and reduce bias in hiring.

• AI for Learning and Development: Develop personalized training programs, monitor effectiveness, and integrate AI into corporate learning platforms.

• Robots in the Workspace: Examine the types of robots used in office and manufacturing settings, and learn how to develop policies for harmonious integration.


Course Program:

1. Introduction to AI in HR:

• Fundamentals of AI in HR.

• Current state and future trends.

• Understanding HR needs and AI capabilities.

• Overview of existing and upcoming robots.

• Application of the three laws of robotics in HR.

2. ChatGPT Capabilities in HR:

• Principles and possibilities of ChatGPT.

• Practical uses in recruiting, training, and support.

• Integrating ChatGPT into HR systems.

• Creating custom GPTs.

3. Automating and Improving Processes with ChatGPT:

• Automation of routine queries and FAQs.

• Employee support and initial diagnosis of HR issues.

• Creation of personalized training programs.

• Utilization for corporate culture and employer brand.

• Generating images with ChatGPT.

4. ChatGPT-Based Analytics and Decision Making:

• Using ChatGPT for data analysis and reporting.

• Analyzing surveys with ChatGPT.

• Forecasting hiring trends and needs.

• Developing retention and development strategies.

• Overview of Microsoft Copilot capabilities.

5. AI in Recruiting and Staffing:

• Improving job texts and candidate communications.

• Tools to automate CV screening and pre-screening.

• Using AI to assess candidate fit.

• Improving quality of hire and reducing bias.

• Sourcing plugins for candidate communications.

6. AI for Learning and Development:

• Personalized training programs.

• Monitoring and analyzing training effectiveness.

• Integrating AI into corporate learning platforms.

• Creating courses on AI platforms.

7. AI for Performance Measurement and Management:

• Using AI to track and analyze performance.

• Developing personalized development plans.

• AI in managing employee sentiment and well-being.

8. Implementing AI in HR Processes:

• HRIS platforms with AI processes.

• Planning and implementing AI projects in HR.

• Change management and overcoming opposition.

• Data security measures and ethical considerations.

9. Robots in the Workspace:

• Types of robots used in office and manufacturing.

• Employee interaction with robots and automated systems.

• Development of policies and procedures for harmonious integration.

• New HR responsibilities related to robots in companies.

10. The Future of Work and the Role of HR:

• Predictions for the future work environment and the role of AI and robots.

• Staff training and adaptation of HR policies to new realities.

• Checklist for readiness of HR processes for AI and robots.

• Developing strategies for effective change management.


Course Features:

• Expert Instruction: Learn from Mike Pritula, a seasoned HR leader with extensive experience in integrating AI and robotics into HR workflows.

• Flexible Learning: Access ten recorded lessons at your own pace

• Practical Application: Complete homework assignments with personalized feedback to reinforce learning.

• Interactive Community: Join a dedicated Q&A chat to discuss topics and share experiences with peers.

• Certification: Receive a diploma upon successful completion of the course, enhancing your professional credentials.


Who Should Enroll:

• HR Professionals: Individuals aiming to stay relevant in the evolving world of AI and robotics.

• Talent Acquisition Specialists: Professionals seeking to enhance their recruitment processes with AI tools.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for HR professionals, recruiters, talent acquisition specialists, and business leaders who want to integrate AI and automation into their HR processes. It is also valuable for anyone interested in exploring how robots and AI can enhance efficiency in recruitment, employee management, and HR operations.

courseDetails.title: First 90 Days: Onboarding for Engagement & Performance
courseDetails.shortDescription: New Hire Integration | Employee Induction Process | Handbook | Orientation | First 90 Days | Training Plan | Culture
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Employee Onboarding: Effective Strategies for Seamless Integration


Course Description


A well-designed employee onboarding program is essential for maximizing employee engagement, reducing turnover, and ensuring a smooth transition into the company. This course provides a step-by-step guide to building a structured and effective onboarding system, from preboarding to the end of the probationary period. Learn how to create a comprehensive onboarding strategy that accelerates employee adaptation, enhances productivity, and aligns with business goals.


This course is designed for HR professionals, managers, and business leaders looking to optimize their onboarding programs, improve retention rates, and create a seamless experience for new hires. Participants will explore onboarding best practices, real-world examples, and proven methodologies used by top companies like Google and SHRM.

What You’ll Learn

• Understand the importance of onboarding and its direct impact on employee retention and engagement.

• Design a structured onboarding framework that improves employee experience and performance.

• Develop a preboarding strategy to engage new hires before their first day.

• Execute an effective first-day induction that fosters a sense of belonging.

• Implement 30-day and 90-day onboarding plans to track employee progress and ensure successful adaptation.

• Utilize onboarding gamification techniques to enhance employee engagement.

• Adapt and improve remote onboarding strategies for virtual teams.

• Conduct onboarding assessments to measure effectiveness and continuously refine the process.

Course Structure & Modules


Module 1: Understanding Onboarding & Adapting Remote Employees

• Overview of onboarding and adaptation strategies.

• SHRM’s effective onboarding model.

• Business case for investing in a structured onboarding process.

• Defining onboarding goals and economic benefits.

• Case study: Google’s onboarding approach.

• Gamification in onboarding to improve engagement.

• Essential checklists for a successful onboarding program.

• Best practices for remote employee onboarding.


Module 2: Designing a Comprehensive Onboarding Program

• Conducting a current state audit of the existing onboarding process.

• Identifying areas for improvement in onboarding workflows.

• Creating a structured onboarding program tailored to company needs.

• Defining an onboarding project roadmap.

• Developing a complete onboarding package from start to finish.


Module 3: Preboarding – Preparing Employees Before Their Start Date

• Understanding where the onboarding process begins.

• Setting up the workplace and systems before the new hire arrives.

• Communicating expectations and company values.

• Sending welcome information to new hires.

• Informing team members about incoming employees using a template announcement.

• Training managers and mentors for effective onboarding support.

• Creating a new hire handbook to streamline onboarding.


Module 4: First Day in the Company – Induction Process

• Designing an effective first-day onboarding experience.

• Roles of HR, managers, and colleagues in employee onboarding.

• Creating an engaging first-day checklist to ensure smooth integration.

• Best practices for introducing new hires to company culture.


Module 5: The First 30 Days of Onboarding

• Conducting structured onboarding interviews with new employees.

• Gathering feedback from managers on employee progress.

• Using employee onboarding surveys to measure adaptation success.

• Team dynamics and new hire integration strategies.

• Assigning mentors and monitoring their role in onboarding.

• Conducting an onboarding workshop for continuous development.

• Post-employment surveys and check-ins after 30 days.


Module 6: The First 90 Days and Completing the Onboarding Process

• Providing continuous feedback to ensure successful onboarding.

• Conducting onboarding surveys at the end of the probation period.

• Evaluating employee adaptation and performance after 90 days.

• Organizing team-building events to reinforce company culture.

• Planning the next steps for career development after onboarding.

Who Should Enroll?

• HR professionals looking to optimize their onboarding process.

• Hiring managers responsible for integrating new employees.

• Business leaders seeking to improve employee engagement and retention.

• Talent acquisition specialists designing onboarding frameworks.

• L&D professionals implementing training as part of onboarding.

Why Choose This Course?

Transform your employee onboarding process and set your new hires up for success. Enroll today!
